interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lesentia Tinted Moisturizer with SPF 31 – Tinted Moisturizer For Face With Spf and Blemish Concealer with All Natural Ingredients like Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E and Zinc* (Medium - 2fl oz)
Review Date: 2020/07/02
Store: L'esentia
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'esentia", 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'jojoba,vitamin e,zinc', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '850016254009'}
Review Text: i wanted to like this but i can't. it has coverage like a light coverage foundation but too dark in color, if you are very tan yes the color would work. i can't believe this is a "moisturizer" because it is super thick and sticky, it feels so heavy on the skin, it doesn't set or feel dry after unless you powder it. i can work with the color, i just don't like how this feels, your skin will feel warm and sticky. it's a shame because there is a lot in the bottle. if you want this for the coverage, might as well buy a bottle of foundation.
Review Title: this feels sooo heavy!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BYS Kabuki Brush BYS {'Brand': 'BYS', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '0.04 x 0.02 x 0.02 inches', 'Item Weight': '36 Grams', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.04 x 0.02 x 0.02 inches; 1.27 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BC/BYNKBS', 'Manufacturer': 'BYS'} It's smaller than expected. I thought it would be bigger because of the price. Is is a very soft brush and good for blending powder and buffing because it's not scratchy, I hate scratchy brushes. It's good to travel with. It also sheds a little bit at first washing. Is is a very soft brush and good for blending powder and buffing because it's not scratchy Mountain Falls Regular Dip-It Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 9 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Weight': '0.5 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '9 Fl Oz'} i love the convenience and ease of use. just dip your finger in the hole and it erases the polish like it never happened. it is potent stuff. it's basically just remover with a foam soaked inside with a bunch of incisions that you can insert your nails in. no complaints except that you will taste the fume (bitter) when you first open it. just keep it away from nose. easy to use and effective JPNK 4PCS Anti-Static Detangling Fine & Wide Tooth Shower Comb Set JPNK {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'JPNK', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy,Straight', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 3.1 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} love love love!

i love how they look. you get a wide tooth and fine tooth, and most of all they are aesthetically pleasing. no tugging, they are not sharp, they don't hurt the scalp. i do recommend. pretty, great value! a lot of combs! 12ML Refillable Perfume Atomizer Bottle for Travel Spray Scent Pump Case Pack of 5 Rioa {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.71 x 0.71 x 4.13 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Surface Matalic Bottle', 'UPC': '753940391508'} [[VIDEOID:a3d7f3db939833c254ff74281c0dde18]] with the corona virus thing, i ordered this to fill with alcohol instead. i carry one in all my coat pockets and pocketbooks, so that i can spray my hands. the size is just right. you can't use up a whole thing of alcohol if went out in public. impressed with how pretty they are too. they are easy to figure out. the colors are just jackets -- you pull off the cap and the bottom so that you can unscrew the sprayer and fill it up. very good sprayer as well. not mad. i am happy. this came in handy Lesentia Tinted Moisturizer with SPF 31 – Tinted Moisturizer For Face With Spf and Blemish Concealer with All Natural Ingredients like Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E and Zinc* (Medium - 2fl oz) L'esentia {'Brand': "L'esentia", 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'jojoba,vitamin e,zinc', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '850016254009'} i wanted to like this but i can't. it has coverage like a light coverage foundation but too dark in color, if you are very tan yes the color would work. i can't believe this is a "moisturizer" because it is super thick and sticky, it feels so heavy on the skin, it doesn't set or feel dry after unless you powder it. i can work with the color, i just don't like how this feels, your skin will feel warm and sticky. it's a shame because there is a lot in the bottle. if you want this for the coverage, might as well buy a bottle of foundation. this feels sooo heavy!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** This user continues to favor soft, quality beauty brushes and tools, with a strong preference for aesthetically pleasing products that marry functionality with visual appeal. Their recent purchase of a tinted moisturizer contrasts their previous enjoyment of practical tools, revealing a greater emphasis on texture and weight in application.

- **Travel-Friendly:** The user prioritizes compact and transportable beauty tools, consistently seeking practicality in their beauty regimen.

- **Expectation vs. Reality:** They maintain high standards for product size, functionality, and price, often feeling disappointed when expectations are not met. Their recent experience with the tinted moisturizer highlights sensitivity to product feel and effectiveness, and a readiness to evaluate harshly when specifications do not align with their needs.

- **Quality Concerns:** The user values durability and performance over time, and their latest review indicates a dislike for products that feel heavy or sticky on the skin. They prefer gentle, lightweight formulas that do not irritate.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Their balanced approach to product evaluation reflects a nuanced understanding of beauty products. While they express appreciation for effective and aesthetically appealing items, their recent critique of a tinted moisturizer emphasizes the importance of comfort in use, indicating a desire for products that provide not just functionality but also a pleasant sensory experience. 

The profile illustrates a consistent desire for reliable, visually appealing beauty tools that cater to functionality, quality, and convenience, while also highlighting a growing sensitivity to product texture.
